evidence.claim: TAG, Inc. utilizes AWS services for its data processing and cloud infrastructure needs.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, indicating secure handling of health information.
TAG integrates with EHRs using standard formats such as X12 for health transactions.
TAG employs REST APIs for integration with various health tech platforms.

icp.icp_reason: Company specializes in healthcare data exchange, utilizing HIPAA and X12 EDI standards.
